thread.section_title: AirportRentals.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AirportRentals.com | www.airportrentals.com | 4 of 189
thread.title: Daniel Marr

author: Daniel Marr
title: Daniel Marr
text:
I went on line to book the rental.
Unfortunately, the site automatically added an external service that we understood was optional. We were assured by the your service agent that it would be rectified.
Following his advice, we have been in communication with the foreign service and assured that it would be looked after.
Fortunately, we were looked after on pickup and return more than expected.
Thank you
